Class GameView

  • public class GameView
extends SurfaceView
    The View the user interacts with (provides events and drawing)
    Author:
    Sebastian Kirchner, Nikolaus Leopold
    Touch-based input by Sebastian Kirchner

      • inHelpMode

        public boolean inHelpMode()
        Returns:
        true if currently in help mode, else false

      • isMusicOn

        public boolean isMusicOn()
        Returns:
        true if background music is playing, else false

      • isPaused

        public boolean isPaused()
        Returns:
        true if game is paused, else false

      • onTouchEvent

        public boolean onTouchEvent(MotionEvent event)
        Handles the Touch Events for controlling the SpaceShip, Buttons and Help Mode.

      • setPaused

        public void setPaused(boolean paused)
        Pauses the game or resumes it. Keeps Screen from turning off if game is on and allows it to turn off in Pause mode.
        Parameters:
        paused - true if game is to be paused.
